title: Industry
overview: In subterranean Los Angeles the porn industry is alive and well. There is no future and there is no past. People exist in a timeless world, driven by the necessity to fulfill the essential needs of human condition. Without the burden of shame or the weight of self consciousness. They live as free men and women, left to their own designs in the purest embodiment of lust. Industry. A world without form. Devoid of thought, a primordial, sexual paradise.  Total video on DVD 4 hours.
